pairs.prompt: Where can I buy bulk custom ashtrays at wholesale prices?
pairs.response:
Response
You can purchase bulk custom ashtrays at wholesale prices from online marketplaces, specialized promotional product sites, and wholesale distributors. Options range from custom printing logos on glass and silicone to personalized ceramic and metal designs

. 

General wholesale marketplaces 

These large-scale platforms connect you directly with manufacturers and suppliers, offering a wide range of materials and designs for customization. 

Alibaba.com: A major B2B marketplace with numerous suppliers offering custom ceramic, glass, metal, and silicone ashtrays at wholesale prices. You can filter searches for minimum order quantities (MOQs) and contact suppliers directly for custom logo work.
Made-in-China.com: Similar to Alibaba, this platform provides access to a large directory of manufacturers, with options for custom branding on metal, ceramic, and plastic ashtrays.
Faire: An online wholesale marketplace that features curated artisans and makers. This is a good option for retailers looking for custom designs from smaller, independent suppliers.
Promotional product companies 

For businesses and events, promotional product companies specialize in adding custom logos and branding to products like ashtrays. 

Underabuck.com: Offers a variety of custom printed ashtrays in materials such as plastic, glass, and silicone, with options for different quantities and color imprints.
Cannabis Promotions: Specializes in branded products for the cannabis industry, including custom printed and etched glass ashtrays with prices as low as about $3.89 per unit.
Smoke Promos: Provides custom logo etched or printed ashtrays on in-stock options, including round and square versions in both glass and wood. Their turnaround time is typically 10 business days or less.
Custom material specialists 

These suppliers focus on specific materials and can often accommodate more complex or higher-end custom requests. 

Z.S.R. Group (Custom Silicone Ashtrays): A manufacturer that provides OEM services for custom silicone ashtrays. They can customize the material, size, shape, color, and add custom logos for branding purposes.

Garbo Glassware

(Glass Ashtrays)

: A large glass ashtray factory in China that can handle high-volume custom orders for glass ashtrays. They offer different styles, including colored and embossed designs.

Pyein (Stainless Steel Ashtrays): A kitchenware manufacturer that offers custom stainless steel ashtrays for restaurants and hotels. They can add a brand's logo for a professional finish.

Crystal Images, Inc. (Engraved Crystal/Glass): Offers engraved custom ashtrays made from glass and crystal, with options for color fill or UV printing.

How to choose a supplier 

Check minimum order quantity (MOQ): Most wholesale suppliers require you to purchase a minimum number of units. MOQs vary widely; some manufacturers may offer as low as 100 units, while others require 500 or more for their lowest price tiers.
Request samples: Many suppliers, especially on marketplaces like Alibaba, offer samples for a fee (usually $20â€“$80). You can assess the quality of the product and printing before committing to a large order.
Verify reliability: For overseas suppliers, check for third-party certifications like ISO 9001 and look at their delivery and client retention rates.
Consider materials and printing method: Different materials have different customization options. For example, glass can be etched or full-color printed, while silicone can be molded and imprinted with a logo.

For custom ashtrays, you can choose from a variety of materials and customization methods

. Handmade marketplaces like Etsy offer one-of-a-kind resin and wood ashtrays, while Amazon and Brand It Promotional Products provide options for personalized text and logos. Several online retailers also offer custom cigar ashtrays and gift sets with additional accessories. 

Custom ashtrays by material and style 

Custom glass and crystal ashtrays 

These ashtrays are often personalized through laser engraving, etching, or full-color printing with images, logos, or text. 

Visol Renner Black Ceramic Cigar Ashtray with Personalized Laser Engraving of Initial

:

This personalized ceramic ashtray comes with a free laser engraving.

Custom Glass Ashtray - Print Your Image Logo Text: You can upload your own image, logo, or text for printing on this glass ashtray available on Amazon.

MoodTrays Custom Heavy Duty Glass Ash Tray

:

This product is printed in full color and is available with an etched finish.

Custom wooden ashtrays 

Wooden ashtrays can be personalized with laser-engraved names, messages, or logos, making them popular for gift-giving. 

Tesonway Wooden Square Ashtray with Cigar Accessories Drawer

:

This customizable option includes a drawer for storing accessories and has four slots for cigars.

Personalized Engraved Cigar Ashtray from Etsy Seller: This custom wood ashtray can be engraved with a name, making it a unique gift.

The Cigar Ashtray Custom Aluminum and Walnut Ashtray

:

This product features a billet aluminum body combined with a custom-engraved walnut center.

Custom resin ashtrays 

For a more unique, handcrafted option, many Etsy artisans create custom resin ashtrays with colors, images, and embedded objects. 

Personalized Resin Ashtray from Etsy: Many handmade resin products are available on Etsy, with custom options for images and colors.
Bulk custom ashtrays 

For businesses or events, you can order custom-branded ashtrays in bulk with corporate logos and messaging. 

Custom Printed Porcelain Ashtrays from PhotoPlates.net: Porcelain ashtrays are printed with your high-resolution artwork for promotional use.
Custom Ashtrays from MunchMakers: Offers wholesale and bulk pricing on custom ashtrays in various materials, including ceramic, metal, and glass.
Custom ashtray accessories 

Expand your custom ashtray with complementary accessories that can also be personalized. 

Cigar accessories 

Many suppliers of custom cigar ashtrays also offer matching accessories. 

The Cigar Ashtray's Custom Accessories

:

This retailer provides custom ashtrays along with accessories like StikBox cigar accessories.

Home Wet Bar's Personalized Whiskey Cigar Ashtray Gift Set

:

This includes an engraved ashtray along with a cigar cutter and a personalized whiskey glass.

Lighters and cases 

Personalized lighters or travel cases can complement a custom ashtray. 

Personalized Leather Cigar Case with Cutter from Etsy

:

This product features a cedar-lined interior and can be engraved with a personalized message.

Custom Design Lighter from Shady Front (via Faire)

:

This lighter can be customized to match a new custom ashtray.

Ashtray liners and inserts 

For easy cleaning or a change of style, consider customizable inserts for your ashtray. 

Tesonway Wooden Ashtray's Removable Metal Liner

:

The wooden ashtray on Amazon includes a removable metal insert for easy cleaning.

Various Silicone and Glass Inserts: You can find custom inserts that fit many ashtrays, providing a personalized and clean surface.
